title: TASTY FRIENDS: Erotic Novella
description: Tanya hasn't had sex for more than two years, and she is extremely frustrated. Pleasing herself fails miserably, but perhaps other young mums in the schoolyard will come to her assistance. Unexpectedly she experiments with a friend who encourages other relationships to develop. After one disappointment Tanya's adventures become increasingly fruitful and she finds more satisfaction than she had originally hoped for, especially with her friend Rochelle. After a mind-blowing threesome involving another friend, Charlene, she realises that sex has brought her more than physical satisfaction. Perhaps Rochelle is more than a lover, and it is with her friend that the future lies.
author: Millicent Dringhouses
